article.title: W.M. Robots Awarded Mine Detector Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: W.M. Robots Limited Liability Corporation, Colmar, Pennsylvania, is being awarded a $11,479,743 modification to previously awarded firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of Vallon mine detectors and consumable spares. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Indian Head, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
